methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc: Initialize the contract - set owner and default global state

methods.name: optInToApplication
methods.desc: User opt-in - Initialize local state for both pods (16 keys max)

methods.name: closeOutOfApplication
methods.desc: Allow close-out

methods.name: updateApplication
methods.desc: Allow contract updates (owner only)

methods.name: deleteApplication
methods.desc: Allow contract deletion (owner only)

methods.name: bootstrap
methods.desc: Bootstrap - Create $BUD, $TERP, and Slot Token ASAs via inner transactions

methods.name: setAsaIds
methods.desc: Set ASA IDs manually (owner only, for re-deployment or recovery)

methods.name: mintPod
methods.desc: Mint Pod 1 - Start growing a new plant

methods.name: water
methods.desc:
Water Pod 1 - Water the plant with configurable cooldown.
Minimum cooldown enforced at WATER_COOLDOWN_MIN (10 min) to prevent abuse.

methods.name: nutrients
methods.desc: Nutrients Pod 1 - Add nutrients with cooldown for yield bonus

methods.name: harvest
methods.desc: Harvest Pod 1 - Mint $BUD tokens based on care quality

methods.name: cleanup
methods.desc:
Cleanup Pod 1 - Reset pod after harvest by burning $BUD.
Expects a preceding AssetTransfer of = 500 $BUD to the contract address.

methods.name: mintPod2
methods.desc: Mint Pod 2 - Start growing a new plant in the second pod

methods.name: water2
methods.desc: Water Pod 2 - Water the second plant with configurable cooldown.

methods.name: nutrients2
methods.desc: Nutrients Pod 2 - Add nutrients to the second plant

methods.name: harvest2
methods.desc: Harvest Pod 2 - Mint $BUD tokens based on care quality

methods.name: cleanup2
methods.desc: Cleanup Pod 2 - Reset the second pod after harvest by burning $BUD.

methods.name: checkTerp
methods.desc:
Check and mint $TERP for Pod 1.
Hashes the terpene profile; if first byte  32 (~12.5% chance), mints rare $TERP reward.
Reward scales: 5,000 - 50,000 $TERP based on rarity score.

methods.name: checkTerp2
methods.desc:
Check and mint $TERP for Pod 2.
Same logic as checkTerp but uses Pod 2 terpene profile.

methods.name: breed
methods.desc:
Breed - Combine two seed NFTs with full security validation.
Expects atomic group: [seed1 transfer, seed2 transfer, breed app call]

args.name: seed1Txn
args.desc: Asset transfer of seed 1 NFT to contract

args.name: seed2Txn
args.desc: Asset transfer of seed 2 NFT to contract

methods.name: claimSlotToken
methods.desc:
Claim Slot Token - Burn 2,500 $BUD after 5 harvests to earn a Slot Token.
Deducts 5 harvests (preserves carryover for players who harvested more).

methods.name: unlockSlot
methods.desc: Unlock Slot - Burn 1 Slot Token to unlock an additional pod slot (max 5).

args.name: slotBurnTxn
args.desc: The Slot Token burn (exactly 1 SLOT token)
